data.lyric:
[ti:she's all i wanna be]
[ar:Tate McRae]
[al:she's all i wanna be]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.39]she's all i wanna be - Tate McRae
[00:01.27]Lyrics by：Tate McRae/Greg Kurstin
[00:02.14]Composed by：Tate McRae/Greg Kurstin
[00:03.17]
[00:11.09]You want the girl with the small waist
[00:13.36]
[00:14.07]And the perfect smile
[00:15.78]
[00:17.05]Someone who's out every weekday
[00:19.01]
[00:19.83]In her dad's new car
[00:21.69]
[00:23.13]You tell me I shouldn't stress out
[00:25.01]
[00:26.10]Say "It's not that hard"
[00:27.68]
[00:28.98]But I just got a feeling
[00:30.98]
[00:31.78]This will leave an ugly scar
[00:33.70]
[00:35.69]If you say "She's nothing to worry about"
[00:39.74]
[00:41.40]Then why'd you close your eyes when you said it out loud
[00:47.41]Stupid boy making me so sad
[00:50.44]Didn't think you could change this fast
[00:53.60]She's got everything that I don't have
[00:56.78]How could I ever compete with that
[00:59.52]I know you'll go and change your mind
[01:02.32]One day wake up and be bored with mine
[01:05.43]
[01:05.94]She's got everything that I don't havе
[01:08.69]And she's all I wanna be all I wanna be so bad so bad
[01:16.72]
[01:17.82]She's got everything that I don't have hm-mm
[01:23.11]You want someone you can show off
[01:25.01]
[01:26.11]Whenever you go out
[01:27.65]
[01:28.97]She'll wear a tight mini black dress
[01:31.02]
[01:31.89]With all her friends around
[01:33.70]
[01:34.90]And then you'll probably spend the night at
[01:37.02]
[01:38.27]Her nice big house
[01:39.61]
[01:40.98]And by then I'll just be someone
[01:42.98]
[01:43.94]You've forgotten about oh
[01:46.93]
[01:47.71]If you say "She's nothing to worry about"
[01:51.86]
[01:53.18]Then why'd you close your eyes when you said it out loud
[01:59.41]Stupid boy making me so sad
[02:01.70]
[02:02.44]Didn't think you could change this fast
[02:05.63]She's got everything that I don't have
[02:08.74]How could I ever compete with that
[02:11.45]I know you'll go and change your mind
[02:14.30]One day wake up and be bored with mine
[02:17.17]
[02:17.96]She's got everything that I don't have
[02:20.70]And she's all I wanna be all I wanna be so bad so bad
[02:28.73]
[02:29.79]She's got everything that I don't have
[02:32.69]And she's all I wanna be all I wanna be
[02:35.85]
[02:40.81]She's all I wanna be so bad oh-ooh
[02:46.17]
[02:47.52]Stupid boy making me so sad
[02:50.49]Didn't think you would hurt this bad
[02:53.20]
[02:53.71]She's got everything that I don't have
[02:56.73]How could I ever compete with that
[02:59.65]I know you'll go and change your mind
[03:02.34]One day wake up and be bored with mine
[03:05.38]
[03:05.94]She's got everything that I don't have
[03:08.66]And she's all I wanna be all I wanna be so bad
[03:13.79]All I wanna be so bad
[03:16.72]
[03:17.82]So bad
[03:18.06]She's got everything that I don't have
[03:20.69]And she's all I wanna be all I wanna be so bad
data.trans:
[ti:she's all i wanna be]
[ar:Tate McRae]
[al:she's all i wanna be]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.39]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.27]//
[00:02.14]//
[00:03.17]
[00:11.09]你渴望拥有一位腰肢纤细的女孩
[00:13.36]
[00:14.07]她的嘴角扬起完美的笑容
[00:15.78]
[00:17.05]她每天都会出去寻欢作乐
[00:19.01]
[00:19.83]坐在她爸爸的新车里
[00:21.69]
[00:23.13]你告诉我 我不该紧张不安
[00:25.01]
[00:26.10]呢喃着 这并没有那么困难
[00:27.68]
[00:28.98]但我有一种预感
[00:30.98]
[00:31.78]这一切将会留下可怕的伤痕
[00:33.70]
[00:35.69]如果你说 你无需为她感到担忧
[00:39.74]
[00:41.40]当你大声吐露心声时 你为什么紧闭双眼
[00:47.41]愚蠢的男孩让我变得如此难过
[00:50.44]未曾想到你会迅速改变态度
[00:53.60]她拥有我身上不曾拥有的一切
[00:56.78]我怎么能与其一较高下
[00:59.52]我知道你会转身离去 改变心意
[01:02.32]有一天醒来之后 你对我心生厌倦
[01:05.43]
[01:05.94]她拥有我身上不曾拥有的一切
[01:08.69]她是我想要成为的对象 我渴望成为的对象
[01:16.72]
[01:17.82]她拥有我身上不曾拥有的一切
[01:23.11]你想要一位你可以尽情炫耀的伴侣
[01:25.01]
[01:26.11]每当你走出家门
[01:27.65]
[01:28.97]她身穿一件黑色的紧身迷你短裙
[01:31.02]
[01:31.89]她的朋友围在她身边
[01:33.70]
[01:34.90]你也许会留在她的豪宅里
[01:37.02]
[01:38.27]与她共度良宵
[01:39.61]
[01:40.98]到那时 我只会手足无措地伫立一旁
[01:42.98]
[01:43.94]你已将我忘得一干二净
[01:46.93]
[01:47.71]如果你说 你无需为她感到担忧
[01:51.86]
[01:53.18]当你大声吐露心声时 你为什么紧闭双眼
[01:59.41]愚蠢的男孩让我变得如此难过
[02:01.70]
[02:02.44]未曾想到你会迅速改变态度
[02:05.63]她拥有我身上不曾拥有的一切
[02:08.74]我怎么能与其一较高下
[02:11.45]我知道你会转身离去 改变心意
[02:14.30]有一天醒来之后 你对我心生厌倦
[02:17.17]
[02:17.96]她拥有我身上不曾拥有的一切
[02:20.70]她是我想要成为的对象 我渴望成为的对象
[02:28.73]
[02:29.79]她拥有我身上不曾拥有的一切
[02:32.69]她是我想要成为的对象 我渴望成为的对象
[02:35.85]
[02:40.81]她是我想要成为的对象
[02:46.17]
[02:47.52]愚蠢的男孩让我变得如此难过
[02:50.49]未曾想到你会痛彻心扉
[02:53.20]
[02:53.71]她拥有我身上不曾拥有的一切
[02:56.73]我怎么能与其一较高下
[02:59.65]我知道你会转身离去 改变心意
[03:02.34]有一天醒来之后 你对我心生厌倦
[03:05.38]
[03:05.94]她拥有我身上不曾拥有的一切
[03:08.66]她是我想要成为的对象 我渴望成为的对象
[03:13.79]我渴望成为的对象
